periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. South southwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm. Mostly clear. Low around 61, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. South wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday

Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. Southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
